channel.title: p5js on Nick's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in p5js on Nick's Blog

item.title: p5js as a Learning Tool
item.description: p5js is a graphics library for javascript that is a port of the Processing language. p5js is incredibly simple. It’s about as close to English as you can get. For example, take a look at the reference: https://p5js.org/reference/. You don’t even need to read the description of each function to know what it does. It’s dead simple. This is not great for performance, and I still stick to using the canvas API itself for most large scale projects, but for simple simulations it’s very powerful.
